roleset.name: stiff, unbending
roleset.note: RIGID-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-Tmprl1to8. (from rigid.01-j)

role.descr: specific location/domain in which arg1 doesn't bend

example.name: arg1
example.text: She is quite rigid and I ca n't move her head even close to midline much less past midline with a fair amount of pressure .
